title: Aoki Hagane no Arpeggio: Ars Nova DC
alternative_title: Aoki Hagane no Arpeggio: Ars Nova Movie 1, Arpeggio of Blue Steel: Ars Nova Movie 1, Gekijouban Aoki Hagane no Arpeggio, 劇場版 蒼き鋼のアルペジオ -アルス・ノヴァ- DC
description: The first movie will be a compilation of 2013's television anime series with new story sequences, while the second movie will be an entirely brand-new work.
